testcase.name: coloring_ggplot_call_can_work_with_all_combinations
testcase.failure: ... %>% deparse() not equal to "aes(colour = ADSL)". 1/1 mismatches x[1]: "ggplot2::aes(colour = ADSL)" y[1]: "aes(colour = ADSL)"

testcase.name: coloring_ggplot_call_can_work_with_all_combinations

failure.message: ... %>% deparse() not equal to "aes(colour = ADSL, fill = ADSL)". ('test_g_expert_cl.R:12:3')

testcase.failure: ... %>% deparse() not equal to "aes(colour = ADSL, fill = ADSL)". 1/1 mismatches x[1]: "ggplot2::aes(colour = ADSL, fill = ADSL)" y[1]: "aes(colour = ADSL, fill = ADSL)"

testcase.name: coloring_ggplot_call_can_work_with_all_combinations
